title: Docker Fixes Critical Ask Gordon AI Flaw Allowing Code Execution via Image Metadata
description: Cybersecurity researchers have disclosed details of a now-patched security flaw impacting Ask Gordon, an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant built into Docker Desktop and the Docker Command-Line Interface (CLI), that could be exploited to execute code and exfiltrate sensitive data.
